summary: [RFE] Impossible to select and download multiple files per FTP
description:
From Bugzilla Helper:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; WinNT4.0; en-US; rv:0.9.2) Gecko/20010628
BuildID:    2001062815

When you're looking at the directory content listing apparently
there's no way to choose multiple files (or select all of them)
and download... you must download them one at a time... so
I switch to IE and do this the most natural way...

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Go to an ftp site
2. List the content of a directory with multiple files
3. Try to download them all

Actual Results:  You must download them one at a time

Expected Results:  You should be able to perform multiple selection just as in
every decent ftp utility
